name: webcomponentsplayground
description: Testing out web component build tools and frameworks

scripts.getPlainSize: echo 'Plain:' && gzip-size plain/financingCalculator.js --include-original && echo '+' && gzip-size plain/scrollHeadline.js --include-original
scripts.getReactSize: echo 'React:' && gzip-size react/dist/webComponents.es.js --include-original && echo '+' && gzip-size react/dist/webComponents.umd.js --include-original
scripts.getStencilSize: echo 'Stencil:' && echo 'index' && gzip-size stencil/dist/components/index.d.ts --include-original && echo '+ financing-calculator' && gzip-size stencil/dist/components/financing-calculator.d.ts --include-original && echo '+ scroll-headline' && gzip-size stencil/dist/components/scroll-headline.d.ts --include-original
scripts.getAllSizes: npm run getAngularSize && npm run getAtomicoSize && npm run getLitSize && npm run getPlainSize && npm run getPreactSize && npm run getReactSize && npm run getStencilSize && npm run getSvelteSize

author: wesselbaum
